body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Bobby Ward and the customer's name is Nancy Young.  The conversation is about a company called Count On Us (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about returns. The customer is feeling angry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to ABC Company. My name is John and I'll be assisting you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Emily! Can you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is eight seven zero three one nine nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I also have your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my phone number is four four zero six five five eight eight nine two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Emily. We'll use it to better assist you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today. If you have any further questions, feel free to ask. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, John. Have a great day too!
